The order processing system.
Manages the progression of customer orders, instances of a Basket as they are progressed through the system.

A class to display a picture in a client
Product
Used to hold the following information about a product: Product number, Description, Price, Stock level.

The order processing handling.
R_StockR
Implements Read access to the stock list, the stock list is held in a relational DataBase.
R_StockRW
Implements Read/Write access to the stock list, the stock list is held in a relational DataBase.

Provide access to middle tier components.
RemoteOrder_I
Defines the RMI interface for the Order object.
RemoteStockR_I
Defines the RMI interface for read access to the stock object.
RemoteStockRW_I
Defines the RMI interface for read/write access to the stock object.
Setup
Repopulate the database with test data
StockException
Exception throw if there is an error in accessing the stock list
StockR
Implements read only access to the stock database.
StockReader
Interface for read access to the stock list.
StockReadWriter
Interface for read/write access to the stock list.
StockRW
Implements read/write access to the stock database.
